**Solutions**

**General points**

Use autoclaved dH~2~O or Millipore H~2~O.

Always add acid to aqueous.

Magnetic stirrers are stored in EtOH so rinse with dH~2~O.

Abbreviation for 1 mg ml ^--1^ is λ.

Refer to Molecular Cloning: a laboratory manual, Sambrook & Russell
(2001).
